title: 150+ Perfect Compliments to Give Your Girlfriend

steps.title: Compliment her on traits she values and what she likes about herself.
steps.content: Compliment her on traits she values and what she likes about herself. steps.title: Pay her a compliment thatâ€™s honest and from the heart.
steps.content: Pay her a compliment thatâ€™s honest and from the heart. Dating coach and matchmaker Louie Felix says, â€œI think honesty is always the best policy. If you think somebody has beautiful eyes, I think it's okay to say it.â€ [6] X Expert Source Louie Felix Dating Coach & Matchmaker Expert Interview. 5 May 2020. Think about what you really admire about her. If itâ€™s something that not many people notice about her, itâ€™s even better because it tells her that you really notice who she is as a person. When you give a compliment to your girlfriend, try to start it with an â€œIâ€ statement to make it seem more sincere . â€œIâ€ statements start with things like â€œI appreciateâ€¦â€ or â€œI loveâ€¦â€. They suggest youâ€™re putting your real feelings out there, which makes you vulnerableâ€¦and gives your words more weight. Make strong eye contact and smile to make your compliment seem even more sincere. Always try to tell her why you admire her. For example, say, â€œI admire how trustworthy you are. You know how to keep a secret and respect your friendsâ€™s privacy.â€ Reader Poll: We asked 406 wikiHow readers and 50% of them agreed that the best type of compliment to give their girlfriend is one that points out something specific about her outfit . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Compliment her character to make it more meaningful.
steps.content: Compliment her character to make it more meaningful. Dating coach Imad Jbara recommends complimenting your girlfriend on her character traits since it's more personal and meaningful than complimenting her on her looks. [7] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 22 September 2021. Whether you compliment her on her bravery, sense of humor, or intelligence, itâ€™s going to mean more to her than a nice compliment about her hair. Compliments about a great hairstyle are appreciated, too! But itâ€™s important to give her compliments that show you love everything about herâ€¦inside and out.

steps.title: Give compliments that are specific and personal.
steps.content: Give compliments that are specific and personal. When youâ€™re complimenting your girlfriend, itâ€™s a good idea to be as specific about what you admire about her as you can. Focus on giving the details in your compliment to make it more powerful. [8] X Research source Point out something sheâ€™s responsible for, like her hard work or achievements, to make your compliments even more personal. For example, instead of saying, â€œYouâ€™re the perfect girlfriend,â€ try something like, â€œI appreciate how much research you did to make sure our cat has the healthiest food and treats.â€ Compliment her efforts, regardless of the outcome. For example, if she studied really hard for a big test, compliment her on this hard work, even if she didnâ€™t get the grade she wanted.

steps.title: Compliments improve her day and help make your relationship stronger.
steps.content: Compliments improve her day and help make your relationship stronger. Marriage and family therapist associate Jacqueline House says that words of affirmation can drastically improve a person's day. [9] X Expert Source Jacqueline House, LMFT-A Marriage and Family Therapist Associate Expert Interview. 31 May 2022. Telling your girlfriend what you appreciate about her opens positive lines of communication between you, which strengthens your bonds. When a person receives a good compliment , it makes them feel appreciated by their partner, which builds healthier, longer-lasting relationships. [10] X Trustworthy Source Greater Good Magazine Journal published by UC Berkeley's Greater Good Science Center, which uses scientific research to promote happier living Go to source Plus, compliments help improve your girlfriendâ€™s self-esteemâ€¦and make you feel better, too!
